title: 47.6 (LOA)
content:
Hy sets down his kitchen multi-tool and addresses you with a smile. "I've already used up the mushrooms you brought me last time. Care to take me down to the arcology again to scrounge up some more? I'll make you the same stew as last time!"

Rangers Choose

A) Sure! I know a shortcut. Discard all   and attach the HELPING HAND mission to Hy Pimpot. Make a stew with Hy Pimpot’s test using only cards with the Mycelial keyword.

B) Some other time. Discard Hy Pimpot. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
